welcome: We are happy to invite you to celebrate with us

story.heading: Our Story
story.couple: Tanya and Daniel met while dancing Bachata at the Technion. Since then, they haven't stoped dancing together, traveling, cooking, eating good food and making wonderful memories. The breathtaking photo you see here, was takes while on a caraven trip to north Italy.
story.solo: At the latin dance club they both work at, she is an instructor, and he is a DJ.
story.party: So you can bet the party will be amazing! ;)
story.cats: These are their two cats - Fisk and Wesley. Which sadly can't attend the ceremony..
